Goal Representation:
def find_light_bathroom(bathroom:item):
    # Function to check if there is a light in the bathroom
    symbol has_light=exists o: item : is_light(o) and inside(o, bathroom)
    return has_light

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        # Check if there is a known light in the bathroom and approach it
        if exists bathroom: item : is_bathroom(bathroom) and find_light_bathroom(bathroom):
            bind bathroom: item where:
                is_bathroom(bathroom) and find_light_bathroom(bathroom)
            bind light: item where:
                is_light(light) and inside(light, bathroom)
            achieve close_char(char, light)
            achieve is_on(light)
        
        else:
            # Check all rooms classified as bathrooms if not verified yet
            foreach bathroom: item:
                if is_bathroom(bathroom) and not visited(bathroom):
                    observe(bathroom,"Check is there any light in the bathroom")
                    # Observe if there is any light in the bathroom
                    foreach light: item:
                        if is_light(light) and inside(light, bathroom):
                            achieve close_char(char, light)
                            achieve is_on(light)
